response.overview: Not quite a festival, not quite a movie, Spike and Mikeâ€™s Animation Extravaganza is crashing the big screen and bringing the party to you! Curated by the weirdos that made INVINCIBLE and THE WALKING DEAD, this showcase of animated short films mashes up infamous vault classics with the official 2025 festival selections.
response.tagline: 90 Minutes of the Most Sick and Twisted Animation You'll Ever See
response.title: Spike and Mike's Animation Extravaganza 2025
